meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gus Iurillo Molly Kossoff Mike Shapiro Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6696.

td.p: Gus Iurillo, a business ownership coach from Glen Allen, Virginia
Molly Kossoff, a beauty-industry magazine editor from West Hills, California
Mike Shapiro, an actuary from Denver, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,800)

tr.td: (Alex: Each correct response--two words, one the reverse of the other.)
(Elphaba: Clues about one of Broadway's biggest hits of all time.) (Glinda: You're good.)

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"The Crucible" &
"On the Road"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'In 1987 Lisa Jackson took a job with this govt. agency & oversaw Superfund industrial cleanup sites; in 2009 she became its leader')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1987 Lisa Jackson took a job with this govt. agency & oversaw Superfund industrial cleanup sites; in 2009 she became its leader

toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Alex: Yes, with less than a minute to go.)

Harvard

Molly
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '[Applause for Molly\'s run of the category]
(Alex: You are right, and you ran the category.)
(Molly: Thank you.)
(Alex: And you have $3,200. And our thanks, of course, to the cast and crew of Wicked and our congratulations as they celebrate their 10th anniversary at the Gershwin Theatre.)

the Wicked Witch of the West

Molly
')
